issue.title: [Packaging][Crossbow] Use crossbow.py upload-artifacts across all CI providers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6739](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6739). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Appvevor and Travis occasionally timeouts and fails during artifact uploading at the end of the builds. Crossbow got enhanced with the same functionality to properly work on azure pipelines.
We should use the same crossbow script uniformly on all CI providers to prevent upload timeouts.
